name: Transloadit
overview:
Transloadit is a Berlin based startup that takes care of user generated content. Web/apps point their uploads directly to Transloadit’s cloud platform so that they can be encoded, transformed, and stored back on the customer’s server or cloud bucket.

Transloadit supports upload progress bars, video encoding, adding logos, converting documents, generating waveforms (like soundcloud), and more as can be seen in their Demos section.

Launching in 2009, Transloadit has grown from a bootstrapped startup to a company processing hundreds of terrabytes for a wide variety of over 2000 customers late 2012.
